statements: SELECT * FROM energy_prices
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kwh FROM energy_prices WHERE price_per_kwh > 0.5
SELECT * FROM energy_prices ORDER BY price_per_kwh DESC
SELECT provider_name, AVG(price_per_kwh) AS avg_price FROM energy_prices GROUP BY provider_name HAVING AVG(price_per_kwh) > 0.7
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kwh FROM energy_prices WHERE provider_name LIKE '%energy%'
SELECT * FROM energy_prices WHERE price_per_kwh > 0.10 ORDER BY provider_name ASC
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kwh FROM energy_prices WHERE price_per_kwh BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.15 ORDER BY price_per_kwh DESC
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_providers FROM energy_prices GROUP BY provider_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT AVG(price_per_kwh) AS average_price FROM energy_prices
SELECT provider_name, SUM(price_per_kwh) AS total_price FROM energy_prices GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_prices ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kWh, rating FROM energy_prices WHERE price_per_kWh > 0.10;
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kWh FROM energy_prices WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_prices WHERE rating IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, annual_consumption_kWh FROM customer_demands ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_prices WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kWh FROM energy_prices ORDER BY price_per_kWh DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_demands WHERE annual_consumption_kWh < 1000
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, rating FROM energy_prices WHERE provider_name LIKE 'A%' OR provider_name LIKE 'B%'
SELECT * FROM energy_prices JOIN customer_demands ON energy_prices.price_per_kWh < customer_demands.annual_consumption_kWh
SELECT * FROM energy_prices;
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kWh FROM energy_prices WHERE price_per_kWh > 0.10 ORDER BY price_per_kWh DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state FROM customer_info WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM usage_data WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT customer_name, usage_amount FROM customer_info JOIN usage_data ON customer_info.customer_id = usage_data.customer_id WHERE usage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY usage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_prices ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city FROM customer_info WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT provider_name, price_per_kWh FROM energy_prices WHERE price_per_kWh > 0.1;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state FROM customer_info WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM customer_info INNER JOIN usage_data ON customer_info.customer_id = usage_data.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_provider;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM energy_provider ORDER BY provider_location DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM energy_provider WHERE provider_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM energy_tariffs WHERE tariff_type='Residential' ORDER BY tariff_rate ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_info;
SELECT * FROM energy_provider;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM energy_provider WHERE provider_location='New York';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT provider_name, tariff_type, tariff_rate FROM energy_provider JOIN energy_tariffs ON energy_provider.provider_id = energy_tariffs.provider_id;
SELECT customer_name, consumption_amount FROM customer_info JOIN energy_consumption ON customer_info.customer_id = energy_consumption.customer_id WHERE consumption_month=6 AND consumption_year=2021;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_cost FROM EnergyPlans ORDER BY plan_cost DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT comparison_date, recommended_provider_id FROM PriceComparison WHERE comparison_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT plan_name, plan_cost FROM EnergyPlans WHERE plan_cost > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT comparison_date, recommended_provider_id FROM PriceComparison ORDER BY comparison_date DESC;
